attributes.action: Give an inflation beating payrise to all frontline NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: MPs have had a ridiculous payrise, so can easily pay a decent rise to NHS workers who utterly deserve it
attributes.background: Give a decent payrise to NHS workers

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
